active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the effectiveness of software-based wiping versus physical destruction for repurposed hard drives containing moderately sensitive data. Reference NIST SP 800-88 and consider cost, time, and recovery risks. What scenarios make one preferable?
